actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort De Russy, Hawaii, for the purpose of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort De Russy, Hawaii, for the purpose of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort De Russy, Hawaii, for the purpose of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.
